CatDescriptText: Mr. Michael Nestor, teacher, 2-C Crawford Village, McKeesport, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 1, 1959, pg. A1 with question: "Do you think that 18-year-olds should be given the privilege of voting?" answer reads: "There are those who would be able to use the ballot wisely. I might add, that there are some beyond that age who do not have the mentality to vote wisely.   There are many stupid persons in this world.  Generally speaking, I would say that there are not enough exceptions to make it a general practice."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Michael Nestor wearing light colored shirt and eyeglasses, standing on Fifth Avenue in front of Thrift Drugs, Downtown
